column2: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases from previous year (Col.2)
column4: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Refused (Col.4)
column5: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Charge Found False /Mistakeof Fact or Law Etc. (Col.5)
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Chargesheets were Submitted (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation was Completed - Total {(Col.6) + (Col.7) + (Col.8)} (Col.8)
column9: No. of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year (Col.9)
